Interface RegularTestResultRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<RegularTestResult,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<RegularTestResult,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<RegularTestResult,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<RegularTestResult,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<RegularTestResult,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<RegularTestResult>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<RegularTestResult,Integer>

    • findByRegularTestIdAndStudentName

      @Query("SELECT rtr FROM RegularTestResult rtr WHERE rtr.regularTest.regularTestId = :regularTestId AND ( rtr.student.name LIKE %:studentName% OR rtr.student.furigana LIKE %:studentName%\u3000)") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<RegularTestResult> findByRegularTestIdAndStudentName(@Param("regularTestId") Integer regularTestId, @Param("studentName") String studentName, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)

    • findByRegularTestIdAndKlassId

      @Query("SELECT rtr FROM RegularTestResult rtr\nJOIN rtr.student s\nJOIN KlassStudent ks ON ks.student = s\nWHERE rtr.regularTest.regularTestId = :regularTestId\nAND ks.klass.klassId = :klassId\nAND :date BETWEEN ks.createdAt AND ks.changedAt\n") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<RegularTestResult> findByRegularTestIdAndKlassId(@Param("regularTestId") Integer regularTestId, @Param("klassId") Integer klassId, @Param("date") LocalDate date, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)

    • findByRegularTestSetIdAndKlassId

      @Query("SELECT rtr FROM RegularTestResult rtr\nJOIN rtr.student s\nJOIN KlassStudent ks on ks.student = s\nWHERE rtr.regularTest.regularTestSet.regularTestSetId = :regularTestSetId\nAND ks.klass.klassId = :klassId\nAND :date BETWEEN ks.createdAt AND ks.changedAt\n") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<RegularTestResult> findByRegularTestSetIdAndKlassId(@Param("regularTestSetId") Integer regularTestSetId, @Param("klassId") Integer klassId, @Param("date") LocalDate date, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)

      @Query("SELECT rtr FROM RegularTestResult rtr\nWHERE rtr.student.id = :studentId\nORDER BY rtr.regularTest.date DESC\n") List<RegularTestResult> findAllByStudentId(Integer studentId)

      @Query("SELECT rtr FROM RegularTestResult rtr\nWHERE rtr.student.name = \'ave\'\nAND rtr.regularTest.regularTestId = :regularTestId\n") RegularTestResult getAvgResult(@Param("regularTestId") Integer regularTestId)

    • findAllResultsByRegularTestSetIdAndKlassId

      @Query("SELECT rtr FROM RegularTestResult rtr\nJOIN rtr.student s\nJOIN KlassStudent ks on ks.student = s\nWHERE rtr.regularTest.regularTestSet.regularTestSetId = :regularTestSetId\nAND ks.klass.klassId = :klassId\nAND :date BETWEEN ks.createdAt AND ks.changedAt\n") List<RegularTestResult> findAllResultsByRegularTestSetIdAndKlassId(@Param("regularTestSetId") Integer regularTestSetId, @Param("klassId") Integer klassId, @Param("date") LocalDate date)

    • findAllByRegularTestWithSort

      @Query(" SELECT rtr FROM RegularTestResult rtr WHERE rtr.regularTest = :regularTest\n ORDER BY\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'japanese\' AND :direction = 1 THEN rtr.japanese END ASC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'japanese\' AND :direction = 0 THEN rtr.japanese END DESC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'math\' AND :direction = 1 THEN rtr.math END ASC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'math\' AND :direction = 0 THEN rtr.math END DESC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'english\' AND :direction = 1 THEN rtr.english END ASC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'english\' AND :direction = 0 THEN rtr.english END DESC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'science\' AND :direction = 1 THEN rtr.science END ASC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'science\' AND :direction = 0 THEN rtr.science END DESC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'social\' AND :direction = 1 THEN rtr.social END ASC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'social\' AND :direction = 0 THEN rtr.social END DESC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'music\' AND :direction = 1 THEN rtr.music END ASC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'music\' AND :direction = 0 THEN rtr.music END DESC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'pe\' AND :direction = 1 THEN rtr.pe END ASC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'pe\' AND :direction = 0 THEN rtr.pe END DESC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'art\' AND :direction = 1 THEN rtr.art END ASC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'art\' AND :direction = 0 THEN rtr.art END DESC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'tech\' AND :direction = 1 THEN rtr.tech END ASC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'tech\' AND :direction = 0 THEN rtr.tech END DESC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'total5\' AND :direction = 1 THEN rtr.total5 END ASC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'total5\' AND :direction = 0 THEN rtr.total5 END DESC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'total9\' AND :direction = 1 THEN rtr.total9 END ASC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'total9\' AND :direction = 0 THEN rtr.total9 END DESC,\n rtr.regularTestResultId ASC\n") List<RegularTestResult> findAllByRegularTestWithSort(@Param("regularTest") RegularTest regularTest, @Param("sort") String sort, @Param("direction") Integer direction)

    • findAllResultsBySetIdWithSort

      @Query(" SELECT rtr FROM RegularTestResult rtr WHERE rtr.regularTest.regularTestSet = :regularTestSet\n ORDER BY\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'japanese\' AND :direction = 1 THEN rtr.japanese END ASC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'japanese\' AND :direction = 0 THEN rtr.japanese END DESC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'math\' AND :direction = 1 THEN rtr.math END ASC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'math\' AND :direction = 0 THEN rtr.math END DESC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'english\' AND :direction = 1 THEN rtr.english END ASC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'english\' AND :direction = 0 THEN rtr.english END DESC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'science\' AND :direction = 1 THEN rtr.science END ASC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'science\' AND :direction = 0 THEN rtr.science END DESC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'social\' AND :direction = 1 THEN rtr.social END ASC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'social\' AND :direction = 0 THEN rtr.social END DESC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'music\' AND :direction = 1 THEN rtr.music END ASC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'music\' AND :direction = 0 THEN rtr.music END DESC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'pe\' AND :direction = 1 THEN rtr.pe END ASC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'pe\' AND :direction = 0 THEN rtr.pe END DESC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'art\' AND :direction = 1 THEN rtr.art END ASC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'art\' AND :direction = 0 THEN rtr.art END DESC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'tech\' AND :direction = 1 THEN rtr.tech END ASC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'tech\' AND :direction = 0 THEN rtr.tech END DESC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'total5\' AND :direction = 1 THEN rtr.total5 END ASC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'total5\' AND :direction = 0 THEN rtr.total5 END DESC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'total9\' AND :direction = 1 THEN rtr.total9 END ASC,\n CASE WHEN :sort = \'total9\' AND :direction = 0 THEN rtr.total9 END DESC,\n rtr.regularTestResultId ASC\n") List<RegularTestResult> findAllResultsBySetIdWithSort(@Param("regularTestSet") RegularTestSet regularTestSet, @Param("sort") String sort, @Param("direction") Integer direction)

    • findAllByRegularTestWithKlassSortAndDate

      @Query(" SELECT rtr FROM RegularTestResult rtr\n JOIN rtr.student student\n WHERE rtr.regularTest = :regularTest\n ORDER BY CASE WHEN :direction = 1\n THEN (\n SELECT COALESCE(MAX(k.sortOrder), 0)\n FROM KlassStudent ks\n JOIN ks.klass k\n WHERE ks.student = student\n AND :date BETWEEN ks.createdAt AND ks.changedAt\n )\n ELSE -(\n SELECT COALESCE(MAX(k.sortOrder), 0)\n FROM KlassStudent ks\n JOIN ks.klass k\n WHERE ks.student = student\n AND :date BETWEEN ks.createdAt AND ks.changedAt\n )\n END\n") List<RegularTestResult> findAllByRegularTestWithKlassSortAndDate(@Param("regularTest") RegularTest regularTest, @Param("date") LocalDate date, @Param("direction") Integer direction)

    • findAllByRegularTestSetWithKlassSortAndDate

      @Query(" SELECT rtr FROM RegularTestResult rtr\n JOIN rtr.student student\n WHERE rtr.regularTest.regularTestSet = :regularTestSet\n ORDER BY CASE WHEN :direction = 1\n THEN (\n SELECT COALESCE(MAX(k.sortOrder), 0)\n FROM KlassStudent ks\n JOIN ks.klass k\n WHERE ks.student = student\n AND :date BETWEEN ks.createdAt AND ks.changedAt\n )\n ELSE -(\n SELECT COALESCE(MAX(k.sortOrder), 0)\n FROM KlassStudent ks\n JOIN ks.klass k\n WHERE ks.student = student\n AND :date BETWEEN ks.createdAt AND ks.changedAt\n )\n END\n") List<RegularTestResult> findAllByRegularTestSetWithKlassSortAndDate(@Param("regularTestSet") RegularTestSet regularTestSet, @Param("date") LocalDate date, @Param("direction") Integer direction)

    • findAverageForEachKlassForEachSubject

      @Query(" SELECT NEW com.example.demo.dto.AverageScoreForKlass(\n CASE WHEN :subject = \'japanese\' then ROUND(avg(rtr.japanese), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'math\' then ROUND(avg(rtr.math), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'english\' then ROUND(avg(rtr.english), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'science\' then ROUND(avg(rtr.science), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'social\' then ROUND(avg(rtr.social), 1)\n END,\n COALESCE(k.name, \'\u672a\u6240\u5c5e\'),\n \'\'\n )\n FROM RegularTestResult rtr\n JOIN rtr.student student\n LEFT JOIN KlassStudent ks ON ks.student = student\n AND :date BETWEEN ks.createdAt AND ks.changedAt\n LEFT JOIN ks.klass k ON k.subject = :subject\n WHERE rtr.regularTest = :regularTest\n GROUP BY k.name\n ORDER BY CASE WHEN k.name IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END,\n k.sortOrder DESC NULLS LAST\n") List<AverageScoreForKlass> findAverageForEachKlassForEachSubject(@Param("subject") String subject, @Param("regularTest") RegularTest regularTest, @Param("date") LocalDate date)

    • findAverageForIntegratedKlassForTotalSubject

      @Query(" SELECT NEW com.example.demo.dto.AverageScoreForKlass(\n CASE WHEN :totalSubject = \'total5\' then ROUND(avg(rtr.total5), 1)\n WHEN :totalSubject = \'total9\' then ROUND(avg(rtr.total9), 1)\n END,\n COALESCE((CASE WHEN k.sortOrder = -1 THEN \'\u500b\u5225\' ELSE k.name END), \'\u672a\u6240\u5c5e\'),\n \'\'\n )\n FROM RegularTestResult rtr\n JOIN rtr.student student\n LEFT JOIN KlassStudent ks ON ks.student = student\n AND :date BETWEEN ks.createdAt AND ks.changedAt\n LEFT JOIN ks.klass k ON ks.klass = k\n AND k.sortOrder = (\n SELECT MAX(k2.sortOrder)\n FROM KlassStudent ks2\n JOIN ks2.klass k2\n WHERE ks2.student = student\n AND :date BETWEEN ks2.createdAt AND ks2.changedAt\n )\n WHERE rtr.regularTest = :regularTest\n GROUP BY COALESCE((CASE WHEN k.sortOrder = -1 THEN \'\u500b\u5225\' ELSE k.name END), \'\u672a\u6240\u5c5e\')\n ORDER BY CASE WHEN k.name IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END,\n k.sortOrder DESC NULLS LAST\n") List<AverageScoreForKlass> findAverageForIntegratedKlassForTotalSubject(@Param("totalSubject") String totalSubject, @Param("regularTest") RegularTest regularTest, @Param("date") LocalDate date)

    • findAverageForEachKlassForEachSubjectForSet

      @Query(" SELECT NEW com.example.demo.dto.AverageScoreForKlass(\n CASE WHEN :subject = \'japanese\' then ROUND(avg(rtr.japanese), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'math\' then ROUND(avg(rtr.math), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'english\' then ROUND(avg(rtr.english), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'science\' then ROUND(avg(rtr.science), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'social\' then ROUND(avg(rtr.social), 1)\n END,\n COALESCE(k.name, \'\u672a\u6240\u5c5e\'),\n \'\'\n )\n FROM RegularTestResult rtr\n JOIN rtr.student student\n LEFT JOIN KlassStudent ks ON ks.student = student\n AND :date BETWEEN ks.createdAt AND ks.changedAt\n LEFT JOIN ks.klass k ON k.subject = :subject\n WHERE rtr.regularTest.regularTestSet = :regularTestSet\n GROUP BY k.name\n ORDER BY CASE WHEN k.name IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END,\n k.sortOrder DESC NULLS LAST\n") List<AverageScoreForKlass> findAverageForEachKlassForEachSubjectForSet(@Param("subject") String subject, @Param("regularTestSet") RegularTestSet regularTestSet, @Param("date") LocalDate calcDate)

    • findAverageForIntegratedKlassForTotalSubjectForSet

      @Query(" SELECT NEW com.example.demo.dto.AverageScoreForKlass(\n CASE WHEN :totalSubject = \'total5\' then ROUND(avg(rtr.total5), 1)\n WHEN :totalSubject = \'total9\' then ROUND(avg(rtr.total9), 1)\n END,\n COALESCE((CASE WHEN k.sortOrder = -1 THEN \'\u500b\u5225\' ELSE k.name END), \'\u672a\u6240\u5c5e\'),\n \'\'\n )\n FROM RegularTestResult rtr\n JOIN rtr.student student\n LEFT JOIN KlassStudent ks ON ks.student = student\n AND :date BETWEEN ks.createdAt AND ks.changedAt\n LEFT JOIN ks.klass k ON ks.klass = k\n AND k.sortOrder = (\n SELECT MAX(k2.sortOrder)\n FROM KlassStudent ks2\n JOIN ks2.klass k2\n WHERE ks2.student = student\n AND :date BETWEEN ks2.createdAt AND ks2.changedAt\n )\n WHERE rtr.regularTest.regularTestSet = :regularTestSet\n GROUP BY COALESCE((CASE WHEN k.sortOrder = -1 THEN \'\u500b\u5225\' ELSE k.name END), \'\u672a\u6240\u5c5e\')\n ORDER BY CASE WHEN k.name IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END,\n k.sortOrder DESC NULLS LAST\n") List<AverageScoreForKlass> findAverageForIntegratedKlassForTotalSubjectForSet(@Param("totalSubject") String value, @Param("regularTestSet") RegularTestSet regularTestSet, @Param("date") LocalDate calcDate)

    • findAllByRegularTestSetIdExcludingAverageMan

      @Query("SELECT rtr FROM RegularTestResult rtr WHERE rtr.regularTest.regularTestSet.regularTestSetId = :regularTestSetId AND rtr.student.name != \'ave\'") List<RegularTestResult> findAllByRegularTestSetIdExcludingAverageMan(@Param("regularTestSetId") Integer regularTestSetId)

    • findAllResultsByRegularTestSetIdAndKlassIdExcludingAverageMan

      @Query("SELECT rtr FROM RegularTestResult rtr\nJOIN rtr.student s\nJOIN KlassStudent ks on ks.student = s\nWHERE rtr.regularTest.regularTestSet.regularTestSetId = :regularTestSetId\nAND s.name != \'ave\'\nAND ks.klass.klassId = :klassId\nAND :date BETWEEN ks.createdAt AND ks.changedAt\n") List<RegularTestResult> findAllResultsByRegularTestSetIdAndKlassIdExcludingAverageMan(@Param("regularTestSetId") Integer regularTestSetId, @Param("klassId") Integer klassId, @Param("date") LocalDate date)

    • findAverageForEveryKlassForEachSubjectForSet

      @Query(" SELECT NEW com.example.demo.dto.AverageScoreForKlass(\n CASE WHEN :subject = \'japanese\' then ROUND(avg(rtr.japanese), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'math\' then ROUND(avg(rtr.math), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'english\' then ROUND(avg(rtr.english), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'science\' then ROUND(avg(rtr.science), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'social\' then ROUND(avg(rtr.social), 1)\n END,\n \'\u5168\u3066\',\n \'\'\n )\n FROM RegularTestResult rtr\n JOIN rtr.student student\n INNER JOIN KlassStudent ks ON ks.student = student\n AND :date BETWEEN ks.createdAt AND ks.changedAt\n LEFT JOIN ks.klass k ON k.subject = :subject\n WHERE rtr.regularTest.regularTestSet = :regularTestSet\n") AverageScoreForKlass findAverageForEveryKlassForEachSubjectForSet(@Param("subject") String subject, @Param("regularTestSet") RegularTestSet regularTestSet, @Param("date") LocalDate calcDate)

    • findAverageForEveryKlassForEachTotalSubjectForSet

      @Query(" SELECT NEW com.example.demo.dto.AverageScoreForKlass(\n CASE WHEN :totalSubject = \'total5\' then ROUND(avg(rtr.total5), 1)\n WHEN :totalSubject = \'total9\' then ROUND(avg(rtr.total9), 1)\n END,\n \'\u5168\u3066\',\n \'\'\n )\n FROM RegularTestResult rtr\n JOIN rtr.student student\n INNER JOIN KlassStudent ks ON ks.student = student\n AND :date BETWEEN ks.createdAt AND ks.changedAt\n WHERE rtr.regularTest.regularTestSet = :regularTestSet\n") AverageScoreForKlass findAverageForEveryKlassForEachTotalSubjectForSet(@Param("totalSubject") String value, @Param("regularTestSet") RegularTestSet regularTestSet, @Param("date") LocalDate calcDate)

    • findAverageForEveryKlassForEachSubject

      @Query(" SELECT NEW com.example.demo.dto.AverageScoreForKlass(\n CASE WHEN :subject = \'japanese\' then ROUND(avg(rtr.japanese), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'math\' then ROUND(avg(rtr.math), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'english\' then ROUND(avg(rtr.english), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'science\' then ROUND(avg(rtr.science), 1)\n WHEN :subject = \'social\' then ROUND(avg(rtr.social), 1)\n END,\n \'\u5168\u3066\',\n \'\'\n )\n FROM RegularTestResult rtr\n JOIN rtr.student student\n INNER JOIN KlassStudent ks ON ks.student = student\n AND :date BETWEEN ks.createdAt AND ks.changedAt\n LEFT JOIN ks.klass k ON k.subject = :subject\n WHERE rtr.regularTest = :regularTest\n") AverageScoreForKlass findAverageForEveryKlassForEachSubject(@Param("subject") String subject, @Param("regularTest") RegularTest regularTest, @Param("date") LocalDate date)

    • findAverageForEveryClassForEachTotalSubject
